pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extremely Fast Nearest Neighbor Search // Finds the k nearest neighbours for every point in a given dataset using Jose Luis' 'nanoflann' library. There is support for exact searches, fixed radius searches with 'kd' trees and two distances, the 'Euclidean' and 'Manhattan'. For more information see https://github.com/jlblancoc/nanoflann. Also, the 'nanoflann' library is exported and ready to be used via the linking to mechanism.
